item.title: CSS Tip: 'overflow-x' for Narrow Contexts
item.description: A quick tip that can help handle design cases that include child elements larger than their immediate parent.

item.title: Connecting to MySQL on a VirtualBox Linux VM
item.description: Here are a few considerations to keep in mind if you’re running a VirtualBox VM with MySQL on it, and need an application on your host operating system to be able to connect to it.
